meanings.definition: A person who uses dental floss to clean between their teeth.
meanings.sent1: The diligent flosser always keeps their teeth clean.
meanings.sent2: I am a flosser and I floss every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: The flosser joked that they could floss in their sleep.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled flosser, weaving the floss between her teeth effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The flosser's dedication to oral hygiene was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A device used to hold dental floss for easier use.
meanings.sent1: The flosser dispenser made flossing more convenient.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new flosser to help me with my oral care routine.
meanings.sent3: The flosser on the bathroom counter always reminded him to floss.
meanings.sent4: The flosser resembled a tiny spool of thread, but for dental hygiene.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flosser brightened up the bathroom sink.
